testsuite.name: Pac1.Lab8
testsuite.system-out: Clicked on the 'Desktops' tab. Clicked on 'Mac' from the dropdown. Selected 'Name (A - Z)' from the Sort By dropdown. Clicked 'Add to Cart' for the iMac. Verified that the product was successfully added to the cart.

Verified the page title is 'Your Store'. Clicked on the 'Desktops' tab. Clicked on 'Mac' from the dropdown. Verified the page heading is 'Mac'. Selected 'Name (A - Z)' from the Sort By dropdown. Clicked 'Add to Cart' and verified the success message. Searched for 'Mobile'. Cleared the search criteria text box. Entered 'Monitors' into the search criteria text box. Checked the 'Search in product descriptions' checkbox. Clicked the search button to perform a new search. Verified that the search results page for 'Monitors' is displayed correctly.
